meanings.definition: Stylish or fashionable in a showy way.
meanings.sent1: She wore a nobby hat to the party.
meanings.sent2: The actor looked nobby in his elegant suit.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was nobby wearing a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in nobby hues.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a nobby display of colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: A person who is stylish or fashionable in a showy way.
meanings.sent1: The fashion model was known as a nobby in the industry.
meanings.sent2: He always stood out as the nobby in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The penguin felt like a nobby wearing a tuxedo.
meanings.sent4: She was the nobby of the group with her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The magazine featured the city's top nobby personalities.
